name: Stay Frosty
description:
A snowball fight has broken out! Try to get home from school safely without getting hit. We worked hard to ensure the game contains a complete story. To experience this story, please persevere through the cold, damp snow. - The devs Controls
  • W, A, S, D Movement
  • Mouse Control camera
  • Q, E Zoom out/in
  • -, + Decrease/increase mouse sensitivity
  • F Toggle fullscreen
Credits

Programming, art & design by Ben Evans & Alex Grace
